channel.title: Linked-List on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Linked-List on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 2807 Insert Greatest Common Divisors in Linked List
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2807 Question Given the head of a linked list head, in which each node contains an integer value.

item.title: Problem 2326 Spiral Matrix IV
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2326 Question You are given two integers m and n, which represent the dimensions of a matrix.

item.title: Problem 725 Split Linked List in Parts
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 725 Question Given the head of a singly linked list and an integer k, split the linked list into k consecutive linked list parts.

item.title: Problem 1367 Linked List in Binary Tree
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem Question Given a binary tree root and a linked list with head as the first node.

item.title: Problem 3217 Delete Nodes From Linked List Present in Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3217 Question You are given an array of integers nums and the head of a linked list.

item.title: Problem 82 Remove Duplicates From Sorted List II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 82 Question Given the head of a sorted linked list, delete all nodes that have duplicate numbers, leaving only distinct numbers from the original list.

item.title: Problem 24 Swap Nodes in Pairs
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 24 Question Given a linked list, swap every two adjacent nodes and return its head.

item.title: Problem 2058 Find the Minimum and Maximum Number of Nodes Between Critical Points
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2058 Question A critical point in a linked list is defined as either a local maxima or a local minima.

item.title: Problem 2181 Merge Nodes in Between Zeros
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2181 Question You are given the head of a linked list, which contains a series of integers separated by 0’s.

item.title: Problem 2816 Double a Number Represented as a Linked List
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2816 Question You are given the head of a non-empty linked list representing a non-negative integer without leading zeroes.

item.title: Problem 2487 Remove Nodes From Linked List
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2487 Question You are given the head of a linked list.

item.title: Problem 237 Delete Node in a Linked List
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 237 Question There is a singly-linked list head and we want to delete a node node in it.
